name: Tom Yum Soup
method:
1. Boil lemongrass, galangal, and kaffir lime leaves in water.
2. Add chili peppers, mushrooms, lime juice, fish sauce, and sugar.
3. Add shrimp and cook until opaque.
4. Serve hot.

name: Tom Kha Gai Soup
method:
1. Boil lemongrass, galangal, and kaffir lime leaves in coconut milk.
2. Add chicken and mushrooms and simmer until cooked.
3. Add lime juice, fish sauce, sugar, and chili peppers.

name: Gaeng Jued Soup
method:
1. Bring chicken broth to a boil.
2. Add tofu, shrimp, carrots, cabbage, mushrooms, garlic, and pepper.
3. Simmer until vegetables are tender.
4. Serve hot with chopped

name: Kaeng Som Soup
method:
1. Boil fish and shrimp in water with lemongrass and galangal.
2. Add tamarind paste, chili peppers, fish sauce, and sugar.
3. Add tomatoes and pineapple.
4.

name: Tom Kha Curry
method:
1. Bring coconut milk to a simmer with lemongrass, galangal, and lime leaves.
2. Add chicken and simmer until cooked through.
3. Serve with rice.

name: Pad See Curry
method:
1. Stir fry beef until browned.
2. Add broccoli and stir fry for 2 minutes.
3. Add rice noodles, soy sauce, and oyster sauce.
4. Stir fry until noodles are tender.
5. Serve hot.

name: Green Curry
method:
1. Fry curry paste in a pan until fragrant.
2. Add coconut milk, chicken, and bamboo shoots.
3. Simmer until chicken is cooked through.
4. Garnish with Thai basil.

name: Massaman Curry
method:
1. Fry curry paste in a pan until fragrant.
2. Add coconut milk, beef, and potatoes.
3. Simmer until beef is cooked through.
4. Garnish with peanuts.
5. Serve with rice.

name: Massaman Curry with Mutton
method:
1. Heat Massaman curry paste in a pot.
2. Add coconut milk and bring to a boil.
3. Add mutton and cook until browned.
4. Add potatoes, onions, peanuts, tamarind paste.

name: Mutton Green Curry
method:
1. Heat green curry paste in a pot.
2. Add coconut milk and bring to a boil.
3. Add mutton, eggplant, bamboo shoots, fish sauce, and sugar.
4. Simmer until mutton is cooked.

name: Spicy Mutton Stir Fry
method:
1. Stir-fry mutton in a wok until browned.
2. Add bird's eye chilies, garlic, shallots, and lemongrass.
3. Stir in holy basil leaves and add fish sauce, soy sauce.

name: Mutton Yellow Curry
method:
1. Heat yellow curry paste in a pot.
2. Add coconut milk and bring to a boil.
3. Add mutton and cook until browned.
4. Add potatoes, onions, carrots, fish sauce.

name: Pla Rad Prik (Fried Fish with Chili Paste)
method:
1. Coat fish in flour and fry in oil until golden brown.
2. Saute garlic and chili paste in a pan.
3. Add sugar, fish sauce, and lime juice and stir until sugar is dissolved.

name: Tom Yum Fish Soup
method:
1. Boil water and add tom yum paste.
2. Add coconut milk, fish, mushrooms, lemongrass, lime juice, fish sauce, and sugar.
3. Simmer until fish is cooked through.
4.

name: Stir-Fried Fish with Holy Basil
method:
1. Cut fish into bite-sized pieces and dust with cornstarch.
2. Fry fish in oil until golden brown and set aside.
3. Stir-fry garlic and chilies in a wok.
4. Add fish sauce.

name: Fish Curry with Eggplant
method:
1. Heat green curry paste in a pot.
2. Add coconut milk and bring to a boil.
3. Add fish, eggplant, kaffir lime leaves, fish sauce, and sugar.
4. Simmer until fish is cooked through..

name: Khao Pad Rice
method:
1. Heat the oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat. Add the onion and garlic and stir-fry for 1 minute.
2. Add the eggs and stir-fry until scrambled.

name: Soi Khao Rice
method:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the curry paste over medium heat until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
2. Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes..

name: Khao Soi Rice
method:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the curry paste over medium heat until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
2. Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes..

name: Thai Omelette
cooking_method:
1. In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs, fish sauce, sugar, and black pepper. Stir in the scallions.
2. Heat the oil in a nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.

name: Thai Cashew Egg
cooking_method:
1. In a medium bowl, stir together the soy sauce and oyster sauce. Add the chicken and toss to coat.
2. Heat the oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat.

name: Thai Fried Eggs
method:
1. In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs, soy sauce, oyster sauce, and black pepper.
2. Heat the oil in a nonstick skillet over medium heat. When the oil is hot.

name: Thai Fried Eggs
method:
1. In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs, soy sauce, oyster sauce, and black pepper.
2. Heat the oil in a nonstick skillet over medium heat. When the oil is hot.
